Creature.Name: Bee
Creature.Description: Whatever ancient magic caused these bees to grow this large fortunately did not make them more aggressive.

Type.Name: Honey Bee
Type.Description: Often found foraging for pollen far from the hive, this creature is quite content to ignore you and chase after delicious, delicious flowers.

Type.Name: Drone
Type.Description: While it is unusual to find one of these bees outside of the hive, one sure way to summon them is to hit it with a stick.

Type.Name: Worker Bee
Type.Description: Usually passive, this bee is generally too busy working to pay you any mind.

Type.Name: Queen Bee
Type.Description: You can call her Queen Bee. Or anything, really. She doesn't understand words.
